author: Scott Gleeson
description: The Warriors coach, echoing the comments of Spurs coach Gregg Popovich, didn't hold back when talking about President Trump.
title: Steve Kerr blasts 'blowhard' Trump, says he's 'ill-suited' for presidency

author: Brian WindhorstESPN Senior Writer
description: Hank Egan coached Gregg Popovich and, two decades later, Mike Brown. The retired coach offers an artistic analogy describing his two protégés -- who keep crossing paths in the NBA.
title: Mentor to Popovich and Brown sees beauty in contrasting styles

description: Kawhi Leonard's injured left ankle will keep him out of Saturday's Game 3 of the Western Conference finals against the Warriors, Spurs coach Gregg Popovich said at the pregame shootaround.
title: Spurs rule Leonard (ankle) out for Game 3
